alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Sarpy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:59PM CDT until July 29 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL SARPY AND DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Flanagan Lake, or 3 miles northeast of Elkhorn, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Omaha, Bennington, Boys Town, Elkhorn, Millard, La Vista, Waterloo, Aksarben, Benson, Chalco, Florence, Standing Bear Lake, Zorinsky Lake, Flanagan Lake, Wehrspann Lake, Prairie Queen Recreation Area, and Midtown. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
